1000/10

its ok

it has a few outdated things about it such as the graphics and I ran into numerous glitches such as getting stuck 3-4 times, moving platform not moving and things like that

the movement wasn't great especially since a lot of the game is platforming because you are so floaty/slippery
and the sound was basically crap compared to today's games with some areas basically having the echo setting at 100%
and compared to today's games don't tend to have rendering issues like where the helicopter would leave render range then come back in again

I know this game was made 2 decades ago and I recognize the groundwork it laid in many gameplay foundations is really important but I'm simply stating that some people will play this game nowadays and comparatively to other well made fps games made from nowadays its not that great it's just ok

A pretty fun classic game, I've been loving the story and look  forwards to finishing it.
classic, but not for me. If you enjoy grafics from like 90's than this game is for. Its not as good as HL2 but still

What's good:
- Fun and variable gameplay.
- Pretty interesting plot.
- Gordon is handsome, smart and cool.
- Puzzles are simple yet interesting.
- Game can switch between fast paced rushdown and slow stealth depending on situation and player's mood (I did both).
- Gordon is once again very cool.
- AI can make you think fast to survive in fights, otherwise rest in rip.
- I personally like the graphics, the game doesn't really feel old due to it.
- Xen looks exciting and quite unusual.

Bad:
- Screw some open levels of Xen (the one where you have to ride an alien aircraft).
- Where to go in the Xen factory?
- Controls feel a bit weird so platforming sometimes becomes a struggle.
- Minor bugs are present and won't be fixed ;_;

Cannot decide:
- Enemies sometimes teleport right behind you.
- These 3 scientists are everywhere........
- XEN GRAVITY WOOO!!

Verdict:
If you never played the game, play or I will throw you to Gonarch's lair.
If you played it, you're a super cool person, let's wait for a new game together.

Good morning and welcome to the Black Mesa Transit System. This automated train is provided for the security and convenience of the Black Mesa Research Facility personnel. The time is 08:47 AM. Current topside temperature is 93 degrees, with an estimated high of one hundred and five. The Black Mesa compound is maintained at a pleasant 68 degrees at all times. This train is inbound from Level 3 Dormitories to Sector C Test Labs and Control Facilities. If your intended destination is a high-security area beyond Sector C, you will need to return to the Central Transit Hub in Area 9 and board a high security train. If you have not yet submitted your identity to the retinal clearance system, you must report to Black Mesa Personnel for processing before you will be permitted into the high security branch of the transit system. Due to the high toxicity of material routinely handled in the Black Mesa compound, no smoking, eating, or drinking are permitted within the Black Mesa Transit System. Please keep your limbs inside the train at all times. Do not attempt to open the doors until the train has come to a complete halt at the station platform. In the event of an emergency, passengers are to remain seated and await further instruction. If it is necessary to exit the train, disabled personnel should be evacuated first. Please stay away from electrified rails, and proceed to an emergency station until assistance arrives. A reminder that the Black Mesa Hazard Course decathlon will commence this evening at nineteen hundred hours in the Level 3 Facility. The semifinals for high-security personnel will be announced in a separate Secure Access transmission. Remember, more lives than your own may depend on your fitness. Do you have a friend or relative who would make a valuable addition to the Black Mesa team? Immediate openings are available in the areas of Materials Handling and Low-Clearance Security. Please contact Black Mesa Personnel for further information. If you have an associate with a background in the areas of theoretical physics, biotechnology or other high tech disciplines, please contact our Civilian Recruitment Division. The Black Mesa Research Facility is an equal opportunity employer. A reminder to all Black Mesa Personnel: Regular radiation and biohazard screenings are a requirement of continued employment in the Black Mesa Research Facility. Missing a scheduled urinalysis or radiation check-up is grounds for immediate termination. If you feel you have been exposed to radioactive or other hazardous materials in the course of your duties, contact your Radiation Safety Officer immediately. Work safe, work smart. Your future depends on it. Now arriving at Sector C Test Labs and Control Facilities. Please stand back from the automated door and wait for the security officer to verify your identity. Before exiting the train, be sure to check your area for personal belongings. Thank you and have a very safe and productive day.

Clasico juego, me encanto el Half Life, recomendable en un 100%, lo pase en 7 horas explorando bien y valio la pena, lastima que si sos un jugador nuevo en el Half Life, tiene demasiados bugs que te harian tardar tal vez el doble o más de lo que tarde yo en pasarlo tal vez, igual sigue siendo super bueno y recomendable aun asi.

Прекрасная игра. Что-бы полностью прочувствовать кайф от игры вам нужно полностью отдаться ее атмосфере. Для меня халф лайф - это не только шутер, но и во многих моментах головоломка, потому-что часто непонятно куда идти дальше(те кто играл меня поймут). Сначала это сильно бесит, но со временем ты привыкаешь и это уже чем-то нравится. Скажу одно - атмосферу в игре не описать, она загадочна и в некоторых моментах есть ощущение полной одиноки. Игра сложна, но только пройдя ее вы в полной сможете понять, то что я хотел сказать. Это первая игра из серии халф лайф в которую я сыграл, далее планирую поиграть во вторую. Никогда не понимал людей которые жалуются на графику в этой игре, как по мне она - не заменимая часть атмосферы. Совет: лучше не играйте в эту игру с русской озвучкой, если вы совсем не шарите в английском, то можно установить мод на русские субтитры (как я и сделал). Короче, игра топ, всем советую.
